channel.title: Authors on Christine Kim
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Christine Kim

item.description:
When I was 9, my parents decided to move to the U.S. so that I can have a stable career with a big paycheck. So I ended up finding the surefire way to make them proud: I became an actor.

I spent a couple of years as a software engineer before plunging headfirst into acting. Now I split my time between auditioning, kickboxing, learning new things, and writing witty Facebook statuses.
